meanings.definition: (verb) to make a hissing sound like that of frying fat
meanings.sent1: The bacon sizzles in the hot pan.
meanings.sent2: The steak sizzles on the grill.
meanings.sent3: The eggs sizzle in the skillet, ready for breakfast.
meanings.sent4: The campfire sizzles as the wood crackles and pops.
meanings.sent5: The rain sizzles on the pavement during a summer storm.

meanings.definition: (noun) a hissing sound like that of frying fat
meanings.sent1: The loud sizzle of the frying pan filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The delicious aroma of sizzle wafted through the air.
meanings.sent3: The sizzle of the fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the room was palpable, like the sizzle of anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The sizzle of the hot oil added flavor to the dish.
